      • stop

        public void stop(long startTime)
        Stop the stopwatch with reset of start time.

      • get

        public long get()
        Get the current stopwatch time in milliseconds. This method can be used as a lap timer.
        Returns:
        The time elapsed so far in milliseconds. Stopped stopwatches will return the time when they were stopped.

      • get

        public static long get(long startTime)
        Get the difference between the current system time and startTime in milliseconds.
